Desc.entry: Promotes the welfare of the Chinese community through the activities of its member groups, which include the Evergreen Agewell Group, the Sheffield and District Chinese School, a women's group, a youth group and a Lion Dance team. Holds Chinese New Year celebrations in February and Chinese school presentation in July. A registered charity.

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Sun 11.30am-1.30pm (Mandarin classes), 2-4pm (Cantonese classes), school term-time only
